title: Infix to Postfix
statement:
# Infix to Postfix Conversion

Convert an infix expression to postfix notation.

## Problem Description

Given a fully parenthesized infix expression with single-letter operands and operators (+, -, *, /), convert it to postfix.

## Input Format

A single line with a fully parenthesized infix expression (no spaces).

## Output Format

The postfix expression (no spaces between tokens).

## Constraints

- Valid fully parenthesized expression
- Operands are uppercase letters
